com.alexelgier.untilted.pitch

Class Pitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alexelgier.untilted.pitch.Pitch

  • public class Pitch
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Object for representation of pitches.
    Author:
    Alex Elgier

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pitch

        public Pitch(java.lang.String instrument,
             int root,
             int string,
             int branch,
             int leaf,
             int harmonic,
             double midi,
             double frequency)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        instrument - Name of instrument. (CB, CB1, VLA2, etc.)
        root - Harmonic of root-group. (1, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13)
        string - String of string instrument. (1-4)
        branch - Harmonic relative to root-group of string fundamental. (1, 3, 5, 7, 11, 13)
        leaf - Harmonic relative to string fundamental. (1-9)
        harmonic - Harmonic relative to common low C.
        midi - Midi pitch value.
        frequency - Frequency value.

      • Pitch

        public Pitch(Pitch pitch)
        Constructor that copies a given pitch.
        Parameters:
        pitch - The pitch to be copied.
